channel.title: Teleports?
channel.description: how do i get working teleports? [u][i]for example[/u] in mage book, clicking varrock teleport teleports you to specific location. also, how do i make it so that it need and uses up runes?

item.title: Teleports?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

/* ** Button id */ case 1: /* ** Checking if the player has the required level */ if (p.playerLevel[6] < 25) { /* ** Sending a message to the player if they don't have the required level */ p.frames.sendMsg("You need 25 or higher magic to cast this spell."); return; } /* ** Checking for runes in bag */ if (!p.item.hasItem(561, 1) || !p.item.hasItem(556, 3) || !p.item.hasItem(554, 1)) { /* ** Sending a message to the player if they don't have the required amount of runes */ p.frames.sendMsg("You don't have enough runes to cast this spell."); return; } /* ** Player teleporting if they meet both of the requirements */ p.teleportPlayer(3200, 3200, 0, true); break;

Read full topic
